location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter to John Beaumont and George Green, Factors at Bushire from Henry Moore, George Green, W. Digges LaTouche and George Abraham at Bussora (Basra)

mods.abstract: The letter confirms the appointment of John Beaumont as Resident and George Green as his assistant. Letter also states that Bushire's books from 1763-69 are enclosed along with other administrative documents (these are not contained in the file).
